name: Supressor
description: First ever Specialist that was release in the game. It focuses in squadron/drone/swarm killing. Very useful in FvF if your opponent has a carrier
obtaining: Can be obtain in campaign training simulation: (Alien Hybrids)
tips-builds: I have 2 recommended build for Supressor the first one is the squadron killer using xeno seeker missile and the second build is good for kiting in FVF using Xeno Redemmer missile and 1 net torp. Very useful when equip in Elite Supressor.. Use xeno beam capacitor for xeno seeker missile for more damage in squadrons and Xeno munitions for Xeno redeemer for more shield bypass.
author: Tsun-Devil Sonanochi
